definition: indicating the most important performer or role, the topology of a network whose components are connected to a hub, mark with an asterisk
details:
adjective
- indicating the most important performer or role
= synonyms: leading
noun
- the topology of a network whose components are connected to a hub
= synonyms: star topology
- a star-shaped character * used in printing
= synonyms: asterisk
- (astronomy) a celestial body of hot gases that radiates energy derived from thermonuclear reactions in the interior
- any celestial body visible (as a point of light) from the Earth at night
- someone who is dazzlingly skilled in any field
= synonyms: champion
- a performer who receives prominent billing
= synonyms: headliner
- an actor who plays a principal role
= synonyms: lead
- a plane figure with 5 or more points
verb
- mark with an asterisk
= example: mark with an asterisk
= synonyms: asterisk
- be the star in a performance
- feature as the star
= example: feature as the star
